attributes.action: exempt sorned and not on the road vehicles from " Road Saftey Bill" requiring them to be insured
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this bill will make it an offence to keep a vehicle with out insurance, we all know that to use a vehicle on the road it must have a minimum of third party ins.this new bill means all vehicles sorned or not fit for the road must be insured. all this will do is put more profit in to the insurance companies. what will we get from this new law, nothing the insurance companies never want to pay out.
